case.title: Tall white guy seeks pretty Asian girl - 30 (london )
case.text:
Hi there I'm 6ft 8 inches tall, working and living in London. Would love to meet a intelligent, witty Asian girl for exploring our beautiful city. I've lived here most of my life but I'd love to share my favorite places with the right partner.
I'm 30 years old in good shape and have a PhD. I have love to talk about all manner of subjects your height and age don't matter. Would just like you to be interesting and cute is a nice bonus. A foodie would be an extra bonus as I'd love to show you my best choices in the city
Send me a photo and I'll send you one back. Type I love tall guys in your email.
See you later.
